SQL.LOAD_LIST: select data_protection_history_id,entity_type,entity_id,request_id, (select comments from elp_comment c where c.comment_id= h.comment_id) comments,status,start_date ,end_date,created_by,created_date,modified_date,modified_by from elp_data_protection_history h where h.entity_id = :report_request_id
